summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 23.49.050, 23.49.070, 23.49.100, 23.49.152, 23.84.016, and 23.84.024 of the Seattle Municipal Code to amend the provisions of the housing bonus with regard to the income groups served by the housing bonus program, to amend the definition of affordable housing, and to add a definition for low-moderate income housing.
